name: Light Neutrino Mass
description: Lightest neutrino eigenstate mass from Type-I seesaw with Yukawa coupling
formula: m_ν = Y² × v_H² / (φ_5 × M_Pl), where Y = 0.8, φ_5 = φ_0 × exp(-Σ γ(k) for k=0 to 4)

sources.name: Theoretical prediction
sources.note: With effective Yukawa Y=0.8, consistent with Planck bound Σm_ν < 0.12 eV

metadata.note: Default cascade level n=5, effective Yukawa Y=0.8
